content.raw: @{5d4aec2b79f5010cdc3da6d5} `c++filt` showed the missing symbol came from ignition math.  @{557058:5de38267-b118-494c-aa76-4fab35448816} found that symbol was for a class released in ignition math 2.6.0.  `apt show -a libignition-math*` showed the version installed was only 2.2.3 \(The 2.2.3 package had the entry `APT-Manual-Installed: no`;  `apt list --installed` would have been a better way to check\).
content.html: @Dougie DeRosa c++filt showed the missing symbol came from ignition math. @Steve Peters found that symbol was for a class released in ignition math 2.6.0. apt show -a libignition-math* showed the version installed was only 2.2.3 (The 2.2.3 package had the entry APT-Manual-Installed: no; apt list --installed would have been a better way to check).
